title: Rajkumari Polki & Ruby Jhumka Earrings
materials: Freshwater Pearls. The gold features a lustrous Hyderabadi polish for enhanced sheen and durability.
features: These exquisite Jhumkas feature a floral motif at the top, crafted with uncut Polki diamonds set in the traditional Kundan style. Below, carved ruby cabochons serve as the central element, framed by a delicate halo of Polki. Dangles of ruby beads and seed pearls add movement and a touch of South Indian elegance. The carved ruby adds a vintage touch, reminiscent of temple carvings.
colors: Predominantly gold with the vibrant red of the rubies and the subtle shimmer of Polki diamonds. The white of the freshwater pearls provides a delicate contrast.
occasions: and can also add a touch of traditional elegance to modern cocktail parties and social gatherings.
description: These Jhumkas are a testament to timeless South Indian craftsmanship. The use of high-quality uncut Polki diamonds and genuine ruby beads ensures a luxurious and eye-catching piece. The Hyderabadi gold polish guarantees lasting shine and durability. The blend of traditional design with modern wearability makes them a valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
